item.title: Cheat Sheet :: GCC Compiling Cheat Sheet
item.description: GCC and Compiling Cheat Sheet Static compiling gcc -static cve_2016_0728.c -o cve_2016_0728 -lkeyutils -Wall Cross compiling a C code from Linux to Windows Install mingw-w64 cross-compiler: apt-get install mingw-w64 To compile a Windows PE Executable 32bit: i686-w64-mingw32-gcc 271.
